<Heading

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/webhook/find"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retorna la configuración activa del webhook para la instancia (si existe).

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Configuración del webhook encontrada","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"enabled":{"type":"boolean"},"url":{"type":"string"},"headers":{"type":"object"},"byEvents":{"type":"boolean"},"base64":{"type":"boolean"},"events":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}}}}},"404":{"description":"No hay webhook configurado"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
